channel.title: I need help making a rs private server
channel.description:
Hey can anyone help me with step by step on making my own private server. I am trying to use defaultscape and code myself and i dont know what to do. so can anyone get me a site wheres theres good step or make me a tut on how to make my own server.
Thank you, lilo choas

item.title: I need help making a rs private server
item.dc:creator: @lilochoas lilochoas
item.description:
@lilochoas wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:4, topic:227872”]Client thing?
Test it?
Lawl =D

Theres a stickied thread on “making a server” by dumbass cutter.[/quote]
Like client folder or like test it to see if the npc and all the monster r in the right spot

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making a rs private server

item.title: I need help making a rs private server
item.dc:creator: @lilochoas lilochoas
item.description:
@lilochoas wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:2, topic:227872”]Just look around in the tutorial section, and you’ll figure out how to add stuff to the server.

                                                         -Creator of DefaultScape[/quote]

oo ok thens well i think i just need to learn the client thing, where u go and test it cause idk how too =P

Read full topic
